usage.cn: 微笑掩盖悲伤，沉默诠释一切。
usage.eng: Smile to cover up the sad and silent all the way.

usage.cn: 微笑就像创可贴。虽然掩饰住了伤口，但是心痛依然。
usage.eng: Smiles are like band-aids. They cover up the pain but it still hurts.

usage.cn: 不要忘掉别人生气时候说的话，因为往往那才是真相！
usage.eng: Never forget what someone says to you when they're angry, because that's when the cover-up truth comes out.
